name: @porsche-design-system/angular
author: Dr. Ing. h.c. F. Porsche AG

scripts.build:wrappers: ng build components-wrapper --configuration production && yarn rollup -c ./projects/components-wrapper/rollup.config.js
scripts.test: yarn test:e2e && yarn test:vrt && yarn test:cbt
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,e2e' 'yarn start' 'wait-on -t 240000 http-get://localhost:4200 && ts-node --project tests/e2e/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/e2e/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:vrt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,vrt' 'yarn start' 'wait-on -t 240000 http-get://localhost:4200 && ts-node --project tests/vrt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/vrt/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.test:cbt: concurrently -k -s 'first' -n 'server,cbt' 'yarn start' 'wait-on -t 240000 http-get://localhost:4200 && ts-node --project tests/cbt/config/tsconfig.json node_modules/.bin/jasmine --config=tests/cbt/config/jasmine.config.json'
scripts.replace: partial=$(node -e 'console.log(require("@porsche-design-system/components-angular/partials").getInitialStyles())') && regex='<!--PLACEHOLDER_PORSCHE_DESIGN_SYSTEM_INITIAL_STYLES-->|<style>(p-[a-z-]*,?)*\{visibility:hidden\}<\/style>' && sed -E -e "s@$regex@$partial@" src/index.html > src/index.tmp.html && rm src/index.html && mv src/index.tmp.html src/index.html
